item.title: How to deploy blog system by hugo
item.description:
this article is to record how to use hugo to build blog

introduction

this server is running on github’s codespace . I’ll try to solve this problem that can’t open the website by access 0Hzc.github.io

1.step1

get ready for the environment,to deploy this server need go , git ,and install hugo_extrended . Notice that hugo edition is hugo_extrended not the standard hugo : if use the standard hugo,you will can’t deploy other themes.

2. step2

according to the docs from hugo’s official websites,use the following command:

1

hugo new site quickstart //dirname is the directory for storing the project
cd quickstart
git submodule add https://xxxxxxx.git themes/xxx. //xxxxxxx is the url for the themes which you choose,xxx is the name of themes
echo "theme = 'xxx'" >> hugo.toml. // this command is add "theme = 'xxx'" into the hugo.toml
hugo server
